org.apache.hadoop.hbase.rest

接口 MetricsRESTSource

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSource, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.JvmPauseMonitorSource
    所有已知实现类:
    MetricsRESTSourceImpl

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface MetricsRESTSource
extends org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.BaseSource, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.JvmPauseMonitorSource
    Interface of the Metrics Source that will export data to Hadoop's Metrics2 system.

    • 字段概要

      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.apache.hadoop.hbase.metrics.JvmPauseMonitorSource
